snippet: Baltimore’s J. J. Hardy hit the fourth grand slam of his career, and Nelson Cruz added his 35th homer, which leads the major leagues, in a victory over Minnesota.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Baltimore Orioles shortstop J J Hardy records his fourth career grand slam in team's 12-8 victory over Minnesota Twins; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Baltimore’s J. J. Hardy hit the fourth grand slam of his career, and Nelson Cruz added his 35th homer, which leads the major leagues, in a victory over Minnesota.

headline.main: Grand Slam by Hardy Lifts Orioles Over Twins
headline.print_headline: Grand Slam by Hardy Lifts Orioles Over Twins
